replies.body:
Making another lag thread won't solve it quicker. Might as well use this thread to tell you what I know so far:

1.8 makes it very possible that blocklag could've been fixed. However, we haven't actually upgraded to 1.8 like you all expected. All we're currently doing is disallowing 1.7 clients, and as far as I'm concerned from javi, we haven't actually been changing development infrastructure to accommodate solely 1.8. I'll assume that it'll be fixed within the next month or so, but I can't make promises.
